# Data Summaries

This section provides visual summaries for a sample of variables. All estimates below are across surveyed household locations. Complete results are available in **STATA format** on (Huddle)[https://abtassociates.huddle.com/workspace/734056/files/#/folder/1170295/list].

<u>Note</u>: the *violin* (pirate) plots below show **median** line in **red**, **mean** line in **green**, and the **blue** region is the inferred **95% confidence interval** of the mean.


```{r extract, eval=FALSE}

# 30 obs not imputed for KEN
# Just do NGA for now, not to confuse things, but code below will run for whatever
# locations are in `pts`
pts <- nga.pts

#####################################################################################
# Travel Times
#####################################################################################
pts.tt <- extract(tt, pts)
pts.tt <- data.table(cbind(
  pts@data[, c("hhid", "adm0_name", "adm1_name", "adm2_name")], pts.tt))
pts.tt[, ISO3 := "NGA"]

#####################################################################################
# AfSIS

# Note that tiles are cached locally
tmp <- data.table(coordinates(pts))
setnames(tmp, c("X", "Y"))
pts.wc <- list(nrow(tmp))
pts.wc <- lapply(tmp, function(x) )
```

## Climatic Indicators

```{r wc, eval=F, fig.cap="Long-Term Precipitation and Temperature Seasonality across Regions (1970-2000, percent std. dev.) Source: WorldClim."}

par(mfrow=c(1,2))
pplot(bio4~adm1_name, data=pts.wc, 
  ylab="Temperature Seasonality (percent std. dev.)", xlab=NA)
pplot(bio415~adm1_name, data=pts.wc, 
  ylab="Precipitation Seasonality (percent, std. dev.)", xlab=NA)

```
